TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供可用於選取在設計階段與控制項屬性 (Control Property) 產生關聯之資料連接運算式的屬性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for selecting a data connection expression that is associated with a control property at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視覺化設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用類別，以選取 連接字串從`connectionStrings`組態區段。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to select a connection string from the `connectionStrings` configuration section. 類別衍生自類別中衍生出雖然它是公用的技術原因，沒有任何優勢。The class is derived from the class, and although it is public for technical reasons, there is no advantage in deriving from it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
override this.EvaluateExpression : string * obj * Type * IServiceProvider -> obj

param.name: expression
param.span: 要評估的連接字串運算式。

span.span: A connection string expression to evaluate.

param.span: 運算式並不包含 運算式前置字元。

span.span: The expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 物件，包含用於評估運算式的其他剖析資訊。

span.span: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating the expression.
The type of the control property.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 評估連接字串運算式，並提供控制項屬性的設計階段值。

span.span: Evaluates a connection string expression and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 評估的運算式字串所參考的物件 (運算式評估成功時)，否則為 。

span.span: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢所指定的型別與連線名稱`expression`，然後傳回此連接。The method looks up the connection name and type specified by `expression`, and then returns the connection. 視覺化設計工具使用評估連接字串運算式，並提供設計階段相關聯的控制項屬性值的方法。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate a connection string expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 視覺化設計工具使用方法來剖析的運算式字串，在設計階段，然後再呼叫剖析的運算式資料的方法。The visual designer uses the method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the method with the parsed expression data. 視覺化設計工具可用於評估的運算式結果指派控制項在設計介面所呈現的屬性值。The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 在執行階段，頁面剖析器會使用並的對應方法實作，以評估運算式，並提供執行階段值針對關聯的控制項的屬性。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 針對控制項屬性設定的運算式字串，用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.span: 運算式並不包含 運算式前置字元。

span.span: The expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 服務提供者實作，由設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 提供，可以用來取得額外的設計階段服務。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 傳回連接字串運算式的運算式編輯器工作表。

span.span: Returns an expression editor sheet for a connection string expression.

returns.span: 執行個體，定義連接字串運算式屬性。

span.span: An instance that defines the connection string expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的編輯器工作表的連接字串運算式的實作。The method returns an editor sheet implementation for connection string expressions. 連接字串運算式編輯器工作表可讓使用者選取的連線名稱和類型，根據目前的連接字串中所定義[connectionStrings 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)區段Web 組態檔中。The editor sheet for connection string expressions allows users to select a connection name and type, based on the current connection strings that are defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) section of the Web configuration file. 一旦使用者選取連接運算式屬性，編輯器工作表實作結合的連線名稱和型別至連接字串運算式，會傳回給視覺化設計工具。Once users have selected the connection expression properties, the editor sheet implementation combines the connection name and type into a connection string expression, which is returned to the visual designer.
